description:
Build the most important monuments in the world in this puzzle game, where the important thing is not to know where the piece matches, but to have the ability to put it in the right place at the right time.  

If you're excited about solving real puzzles, you're sure to love World Map: Crafted City Builder too!
name: World Map: Crafted City Builder
intro: Enjoy an exciting puzzle! An addictive game where you will have to prove your ability to fit the pieces at the right time. Be careful! The monument may collapse
